ygData.subject: RE: Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, I know this thread is getting off line here, but this is in the same line: In Oasis (what is with people in Oasis) someone sent a shout Level 154
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, I know this thread is getting off line here, but this is in the same
line:

In Oasis (what is with people in Oasis) someone sent a shout "Level 154
warrior looking for a group". There were quite a few witty jokes ("Level
154! I wouldn't get exp","You mean level 154 hunts here? I'm in the wrong
zone!"). Too bad the guy didn't have a sense of humor. :-)

Windleaf Mistsong
Guardians of the Divine Light

> -----Original Message-----
> From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 1999 1:33 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Rumor of the bards ultimate weapon?
>
>
> From: jhenders@...
>
> On Wed, Nov 24/99, Jack Naugle <zendarin@...> wrote:
> >
> > This is the truth. There are a lot of dumb people playing.
> This morning
> > someone in Lake Rathe was shouting for someone to group
> with them and go to
> > 1000 island. I shout back 'not right now, I'm dressing' (I
> couldn't help it,
> > I had just woken up, heh). The next thing I know this
> person is giving me a
> > tell 'so when you're finished getting dressed do you want
> to group?' ACK. Me
> > humor was wasted (pathetic attempt though it may have been).
>
> Heh. Speaking of pathetic humour, someone shouted out in
> Oasis the other
> day "SG buy P1". I just couldn't resist shouting back "How much did he
> pay?"
>
>
>
> --
> Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
